body.text:
Dear Richard,



Greetings of the day!



We would like to inform you that currently we have only one open purchase
order from your side, which is PO 60110.



Additionally, we regret to inform you that the container was stuffed on 3rd
September. The delay occurred as the material was rejected by our QC team
due to certain quality concerns.



Please find the details below for your reference:



*PO No.*

*SC No.*

*Products *

*Stuffing Date*

*ETD*

*ETA*

*Remarks*

PO 60110

40139

Nonyl phenol ethoxylate 40 (flakes)

03-Sep-25

10-Sep-25

25-Oct-25



PO 60094

-

-

-

-

-

No PO found against this number

PO 60132

-

-

-

-

-

No PO found against this number



Kindly find the below offer,



*Products*

*FOB/MT (USD)*

*CIF/MT (USD) - 20ft*

*CIF/MT (USD) - 40ft*

Sorbitan Mono Oleate (HG)

1850

1980

1970

Castor Oil Ethoxylate 36 (Low dioxane)

1750

1880

1870

Castor Oil Ethoxylate 5

1850

1980

1970

Lauryl Alcohol Ethoxylate 7

2200

2330

2320

Octyl phenol ethoxylate 10 (Low dioxane)

1950

2080

2070



Incoterm          : CIF Charleston

Packing            : 1000kg IBC tanks

Lead Time        : 3-4 weeks after receiving the confirmed order

Offer validity    : Subject to reconfirmation at the time of order placement

Rest of terms remain same.



Additionally, we would like to inform you that:



·        A 20ft container can accommodate 20 IBCs

·        A 40ft container can accommodate 24 IBCs



Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. Please let us know if you
require any further clarification.



*

I have customers stressing over the material we purchased from Matangi, PO
60094- the Sorbitan Stearate and sorbitan tristearate, placed 6/16  when
will it ship?



Looks like PO 60100 has shipped, OP-10



PO 60110 NP-40, placed 6/27, when will it ship?



PO 60132 SAL-20 and LA-4. Placed 7/10 When will this ship, customer has
called several times as to when this will hit the water, he will be shut
down in 5 weeks if we do not have material.



Need to place a  PO for some items you state you have in stock.

Please confirm Quantities, you can start filling and I will issue PO on
Thursday morning. Out of office tomorrow,



SMO - which have we purchased in the past? Attached is Spec.   6 totes

Castor Oil Ethoxylate 36 8 totes

Castor Oil Ethoxylate 5    4 totes

Lauryl Alcohol Ethoxylate 7 moles 8 totes

Octyl phenol ethoxylate           10 totes



I am having to buy US goods due to these long lead times. Need some help,
as I have been told many times recently,







Richard Barnhardt

FCI Technology

rbarnhardt@fcitechnology.net

704-629-4630 Ext 1206
